website_summaries.verdict: Race through all four seasons in a photo-realistic British countryside with over 450 cars alongside a huge community of racing fans.
pros: Enjoy a wild racing festival atmosphere as you seamlessly meet and make friends with other drivers
There’s so much to see, experience, and unlock in this beautiful game — it’ll keep the most dedicated racing fans entertained for a while
cons: The “Ultimate Add-Ons Bundle” is an expensive upgrade, but may be worth it for hardcore fans

customer_reviews.title: Top driving game possible out to date
customer_reviews.text: Forza Horizon 4 is possibly the best driving game out. Is it a racing game, not really, if you're looking for racing games, go to the Forza motorsports series of games, if you're looking for driving games, the Horizon series is where its at. So far my only complaint really and the game's downfall fall for me at least, is all the stupid dance moves and clothes you win to dress your avatar in the game, its pretty pointless. 9 times out of 10, you'll win pointless clothes or something else to add to your avatar. I want CR points and cars, not clothes to outfit my avatar.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Forza Horizon 4
customer_reviews.text: Forza was the main reason I bought a XBOX in early 2018. After I got it I bought every Forza game that was out for the system! Forza Horizon 3 came with my XBOX and I really liked that game! The graphics in Forza Horizon 4 have improved the game will deff be one of the best ones of 2018! Deff recommend getting!
customer_reviews.author: HenDog

customer_reviews.title: Failure to get past load screen from start
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this game, but ever so disappointed to find out that it crashes and goes straight back to home screen. Anyone figure out how to fix that?
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nanalook

customer_reviews.title: Worth every minute of time spent playing
customer_reviews.text: First thing I didn't like was the 18gb update that took hours on my not so high speed network ... but once up and running I really enjoyed the beauty of it all. Worth all of the hype ... I love racing games better than fighting games and this one is the best so far. I really want more cars though ... so I'll have to pay extra for the deluxe version. I think you can still upgrade those items. I started off above average, but couldn't finish better than 5th in the racing games. So I went back to average and win 1st and 2nd now.
customer_reviews.author: geetrue

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: This game sucks. Extremely hard even at rookie setting. I’m no hardcore gamer but this is ridiculous. Menus are confusing and too intricate. Hard to earn money to unlock the cars you want. It’s so hard to keep control of your car. It’s almost impossible to keep the tail end of your car from sliding out from under you and losing control.
customer_reviews.author: JoePat627

customer_reviews.title: great offline, but online not so much
customer_reviews.text: would be 5 stars if they hadnt taken away solo adventure. Also having the drive to another point as an actual event is a bad choice. In fact I dont like the online much at all..... 3 was better. However the offline career is great. Please get rid of the silly emotes and daft clothes though...... its not fortnite
customer_reviews.author: Lisanne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Graphics
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he's really gotten his money's worth out of it. He's played it almost daily since ordering almost 2 months ago and is still loving it. The graphics are amazing, there's tons of stuff to do, and even the kids like to either play it or help Daddy design his cars. I'm not familiar with the other Forza games but this one is definitely great.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! The only game I play right now!
customer_reviews.text: I love the graphics. I love the car selection. The racing is fun and there is lots of variety. Dirt, street, circuit, sprints, and boss battle racing! Customize your cars and trucks and buggies. Lots of vinyls, paints, wheels, and bodykit options. Upgrade the car performance with motor swaps and all the parts. This game is everything I want! I'd highly recommend Forza Horizon 4!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Disc version - loading had issues
customer_reviews.text: I just got the game, so can't give a full review, but just a note to some - I put the disc in and nothing happened, repeatedly tried, still nothing (but it was spinning each time). I then did a full power off (unplugging Xbox from the wall and waiting 10 seconds), then rebooted (disc was still in) and........nothing (disc was spinning). I then one more time removed and re-insterted the disc and only then did it start up so I could install it. This is on my Xbox One S (slim).
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves this game.
customer_reviews.text: Got for nephew and he loves it now that he knows how to win cars and other items. Really likes the seasons and car mods. He is 9 and is doing pretty good. He is happy and that's what matters, right.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It's an alright game for a game

customer_reviews.title: Driving around the UK like a maniac

I don't play video games but I love this and we play almost every night before bed. At first I was really terrible at it, but now I usually finish in like 3rd place. Can't wait to actually go to England and drive 190 mph in a Bugatti!

product_meta.title: Forza Horizon 4 Standard Edition – Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:Standard4 CHANGES EVERYTHING. Dynamic seasons change everything at the world’s greatest automotive festival. Go it alone or team up with others to explore beautiful and historic Britain in a shared open world. Collect, modify and drive over 450 cars. Race, stunt, create and explore – choose your own path to become a Horizon Superstar.
feature_bullets: Seasons change everything. For the first time in the racing and driving genre, experience dynamic seasons in a shared open-world. Explore beautiful scenery, collect over 450 cars, and become a Horizon Superstar in historic Britain. (Some cars provided by online update.
Britain like you’ve never seen it. Discover lakes, valleys, castles, and breathtaking scenery all in spectacular native 4K and HDR on Xbox One X and Windows 10.
Master driving in all seasons. Explore a changing world through dry, wet, muddy, snowy, and icy conditions.
New content every week. Every week, a new season change brings new themed content, gameplay, challenges, and rewards.

Go it alone or team up. Play solo or cooperatively. Join team multiplayer for casual fun or ranked teams to take on the best in the world. Xbox live gold (sold separately) required for online multiplayer on Xbox consoles.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,634 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
